name: Super Square Siblings
description:
Jump around as a square. Airdash into the other square to score a point. First to 5 wins!

Required: 2 Xbox controllers and an IRL friend. (no Keyboard support sorry :( )

Controls:

Left Joystick - move horizontally

Y - Jump, double jump

B/RT/LT - Airdash (in direction of left joystick) (must be airborne)

--

Music By Gravity Sound

www.gravitysound.studio

--

Trying to dive into game dev by writing a #GameAWeek.

Week 2 (and a half): Started by trying to create a 2d platformer. Ended up imitating Super Smash Bros physics and making a simple local multiplayer fighting game out of it.
